tool.name: PeacoQC Analysis

param.name: input
param.label: Input FCS file
param.help: FCS file containing flow cytometry data for quality control.

tool.help:
**What this tool does** This tool performs quality control on flow cytometry data using the PeacoQC package.
**Inputs** FCS files containing the flow cytometry data to be analyzed.
**Outputs** An R data file (.rdata) containing the results of the PeacoQC quality control analysis.
